name: My First Chemistry Set
description:
Do you love watching CSI? Have you always wondered why they wear goggles, and what all that glassware is for?

SO DO I!

So I made myself an expert over the weekend. And I invite you to join me. Chemistry is easy, it's pretty much like a puzzle game, really. No, really.

Easy to play: mouse click and drag&drop. Try not to cause any explosions.
